column3: Although there was some problem with the conditioner in my first room, the staff help us to change the room.
The location is fine. Breakfast was OK.
column4: We couldn't figure out how to turn off the heater/air conditioner completely during the night, which would have been nice, because the sound was bothering us.

column3: Location,nice peronal, parking (did not get breakfast), god size
column4: Floor in room not clean, no fridge, a boring room

column3: the bathroom was nice and clean and the hotel was very central
column4: the bed is very uncomfortable and the rooms are not soundproof thus you can hear everything happening outside in the corridor. unfortuantely it affected my sleep a lot

column3: The location is very good. 10 minutes walk to Antwerp Central station

column4: Air conditioning wasnt working and it was cold

column3: Very well positioned. It is in the center near the shopping centers and the train station. Very friendly and welcoming staff! We recommend with warmth!
